benchmark_details.name: R2-Bench
benchmark_details.overview: R2-Bench is a benchmark framework to evaluate the robustness of referring perception models against various perturbations across five key tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To systematically assess the resilience of referring perception models against perturbations under realistic conditions.

data.source: Custom synthesized data augmented with various perturbations.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on performance change compared to clean data.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better robustness of models under perturbations.
methodology.baseline_results: Various baseline models tested, specific performance results vary.
